data.persona: I am a customer who wants to try the new corn. I sometimes enjoy coming outside to see crowds. I do not see the point of certain things.
data.description:
You are in the Outside Castle.
The outside castle is beautifully decorated with priceless gems and artifacts. The stone used is ancient and antique with a shiny gloss of silver. The gardens outside the castle are a beautiful green and have the most delightful flowers.
There's a flower, a stone, a The garden, a The drawbridge to the castle., and a The outside castle here.
The the dragon who breathes fire and won't let her out. is here.

You are carrying a Napkin, wearing a shirt and a Pocket watch, and wielding a sandal.
data.goal: hit the dragon who breathes fire and won't let her out.

data.short_motivation: I want to free the princess from the dragon's prison.
data.mid_motivation: I want to form a relationship with the princess.
data.long_motivation: I would like to marry the princess and start a family with her, after moving far away from this kingdom.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the castle to get a good vantage point on the princess's window.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the pocket watch as a distraction after spotting the dragon.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: use the pocket watch with a throw to create a distraction. Once the dragon is distracted, I strike.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the magic spell written down on my napkin to freeze the dragon in place.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: drop the napkin. Once it touches the ground, the spell is activated.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: steal the princess from her prison in the castle and flee from the dragon.
